Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Adding a new context menu item to the resource's context menu in the explorer is fairly easy since OpenCms 10.

In this topic, we only show the output of the example. To understand it, view the source (with an additional explanation) on GitHub.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: See by example how to add context menu items to the explorer's context menu on resources.

AlkaconDocumentationTopicFrame.Keywords: extending OpenCms, workplace, explorer, context menu

Link.LinkText: Sourcecode on GitHub with more information on the example

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: The source code of the example module, adding a new context menu item.

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: Install the module in your OpenCms instance and then restart the servlet container. Afterwards, you should see the new context menu item "Greet -> "Say Hello" in the context menu of non-folder resources.
